DOC.brief_summary: This study seek determine benefit FES-LE cycling cycle alone walk performance quality life people multiple sclerosis .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Functional Electrical Stimulation Cycling Versus Cycling Only Walking Quality Life MS
DOC.detailed_description: Functional Electrical Stimulation ( FES ) rehabilitation tool stimulate nerve via electrical current , cause muscle contract . When FES appled leg muscle stationary cycling leg move fix rhythmical pattern . Previous study demonstrate FES cycle safe effective exercise individual recover spinal cord injury stroke , applied tool progressive disorder , multiple sclerosis ( MS ) . The aim study assess immediate short-term effect 8-week training program comparing FES low extremity cycle cycle without FES . Twenty volunteer MS participate . They randomly assigned training group . This study examine effect train quality life , endurance , walk speed , step quality . Participants sign inform consent complete questionnaire include medical history demographic data . Before training , immediately train finish one month training , self-report questionnaire , time walking test complete . During walk test , step quality speed measure sensor worn belt
DOC.criteria: Medical Diagnosis MS Patientdetermined Disease Steps score 3.0 6.0 inclusive Ability attend train session 3 time per week 810 week period Passing submaximal exercise test Adequate hip range motion ( least 110 degree ) Adequate knee range motion ( 1090 degree ) Cognitive deficit would interfere ability sign consent understand procedure study . History presence neurological pathology interfere movement Received physical therapy within last 4 week prior study History acute exacerbation MS symptom within 4 week prior study Immunosuppressive steroid therapy within past 4 week Significant spasticity leg interfere cycle motion History congestive heart failure Coronary Artery Disease Uncontrolled Hypertension History epilepsy seizure Cardiac demand pacemaker implant defibrillator Unhealed fracture legs Pressure sores open wound legs Pregnant try conceive
